thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: M Bianchi
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da M Bianchi

author: M Bianchi
title: M Bianchi
text: I ordered two sets of frames from this company, having never used them before. I was impressed with the price, the quality and the speed of delivery. It ticked all the boxes. I had to return a pair, and was guided through the returns process informatively, efficiently and politely. It was a rare online experience where you feel more than just a number. I have only just sent over the frames so I cannot update yet on how that extra step went, but I had confidence in the company to send them back from Australia.
